Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/76th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses temp. rerouted NB: King Drive, 76th, Eberhart, 75th, and King Drive;  SB: King Drive, 75th, Vernon, 76th, and King Drive nr King Drive/76th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions,  due to street blockage at King Drive/76th.

Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, 76th, Eberhart, 75th, and King Drive.

Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 75th, Vernon, 76th, and King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Madison
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Jackson, Central, Madison and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, Jackson, Central, Madison and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Madison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier a mechanical problem on a train at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier a mechanical problem on a train at 63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
